title: LAGLAGLAGLAGLAG
body: I don't understand why they changed the whole system like BETA. I have so many lags. First when I enter it lags, and when some one chats me it is really slow. Also, I was in ranked game, and it was my turn to choose a champion, but there was a hug lag, and I could not see a single champion, so I had to dodge from the beginning. I hope those lags should be fixed soon. And I am using my MacBook pro which was bought like a week ago. So this should not be my computer's problem.

replies.body: It sounds like you're having some pretty big issues getting a stable connection with our servers if you're having those types of problems every step of the way. Since you mentioned you just recently bought that macbook, there might be some network settings that need a little adjusting to get them in tip top shape. Check out [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) so that we can make sure your network is properly configured first.
